azurerm_monitor_action_group.description: Manages an Action Group within Azure Monitor

name.description: The name of the webhook receiver. Names must be unique (case-insensitive

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Action Group instance.

short_name.description: The short name of the action group. This will be used in SMS messages.

enabled.description: Whether this action group is enabled. If an action group is not enabled, then none of its receivers will receive communications. Defaults to `true`.

arm_role_receiver.description: One or more `arm_role_receiver` blocks as defined below.

automation_runbook_receiver.description: One or more `automation_runbook_receiver` blocks as defined below.

azure_app_push_receiver.description: One or more `azure_app_push_receiver` blocks as defined below.

azure_function_receiver.description: One or more `azure_function_receiver` blocks as defined below.

email_receiver.description: One or more `email_receiver` blocks as defined below.

itsm_receiver.description: One or more `itsm_receiver` blocks as defined below.

logic_app_receiver.description: One or more `logic_app_receiver` blocks as defined below.

sms_receiver.description: One or more `sms_receiver` blocks as defined below.

voice_receiver.description: One or more `voice_receiver` blocks as defined below.

webhook_receiver.description: One or more `webhook_receiver` blocks as defined below.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

use_common_alert_schema.description: Enables or disables the common alert schema.

automation_account_id.description: The automation account ID which holds this runbook and authenticates to Azure resources.

webhook_resource_id.description: The resource id for webhook linked to this runbook.

is_global_runbook.description: Indicates whether this instance is global runbook.

service_uri.description: The URI where webhooks should be sent.

email_address.description: The email address of this receiver.

function_app_resouce_id.description: The Azure resource ID of the function app.

function_name.description: The function name in the function app.

http_trigger_url.description: The http trigger url where http request sent to.

workspace_id.description: The Azure Log Analytics workspace ID where this connection is defined.

connection_id.description: The unique connection identifier of the ITSM connection.

ticket_configuration.description: A JSON blob for the configurations of the ITSM action. CreateMultipleWorkItems option will be part of this blob as well.

resource_id.description: The Azure resource ID of the logic app.

callback_url.description: The callback url where http request sent to.

country_code.description: The country code of the voice receiver.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the voice receiver.

id.description: The ID of the Action Group.

create.description: Used when creating the Action Group.

update.description: Used when updating the Action Group.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Action Group.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Action Group.
